src:
Loš dan za srpsku odbojku: Vojvodina na rubu eliminacije, u Novom Sadu potrebno čudo
Arkada lako odnela pobedu protiv Lala

06 Nov 2019


Nije tajna da je srpska klupska odbojka godinama u potpunom rasulu. Šest od sedam klubova koji su izborili plasman u Evropu moralo je da se povuče i pre nego što je bilo kakva borba počela zbog nedostatka novčanih sredstava. Da stvar bude još gora, na rubu eliminacije se sada nalazi i jedini predstavnik koji je započeo kvalifikacije za Ligu šampiona. Vojvodina je danas potpuno razbijena u susednoj Rumuniji od Arkade iz Galacija i bilo bi neophodno čudo u revanšu kako bi prošla dalje - 3:0 (25:23, 25:17, 25:21).

Međutim, nije se na početku meča činilo da će Vojvodina tako lako biti poražena u Rumuniji. Novosađani su sasvim dobro parirali Arkadi, konstantno rezultatski bili u igri, ali su ih koštale dve velike greške na samom kraju seta. Na prvu, a i jedinu set loptu protivnika, odbojkaši gostujuće ekipe su smečovali pravo u vrh mreže na trojni blok. Na taj način, gotovo da su poklonili set Arkadi - 25:23.
Nakon toga, usledio je logičan pad u igri Novosađana. Već na startu Arkada je ušla u seriju poena, a Lale nisu sa servisa dugo uspevale da skinu Nilsa Klapvajka. Gotovo da nije bilo odigrano ni 15 poena, već je bilo jasno ko će uzeti drugi set. Do kraja, domaći su samo rutinski sve priveli kraju - 25:17.
Ni treći set nije doneo neku veću promenu na terenu. Vojvodina je pokušavala da se izbori sa, objektivno gledano, kvalitetnijim rivalom, ali je uvek naletala na neprobojan zid. Doduše, ponovo su Lale rezultatski bile prilično blizu Arkade iz Galacija, ali su poklekle na samom kraju - 25:21.
Tako će u Novom Sadu za sedam dana biti neophodno čudo kako bi Vojvodina ostala u konkurenciji za plasman u Ligu šampiona. Ukoliko do toga ne dođe, Lale će takmičenje nastaviti u CEV Kupu, takmičenju nešto slabijeg kvaliteta.

Foto: 
MN Press
text:
Bad day for Serbian volleyball: Vojvodina on the brink of elimination, a miracle needed in Novi Sad
Arcade easily won against Lal

06 Nov 2019


It's no secret that the Serbian club volleyball has been in full swing for years. Six of the seven clubs that won the placement in Europe had to withdraw before any fight began due to lack of funds. To make matters worse, there is now only one representative on the brink of elimination who has started Champions League qualifying. Today, Vojvodina is completely shattered in neighboring Romania by the Arcade of Galatians, and a miracle in the rematch would be necessary to move on - 3-0 (25:23, 25:17, 25:21).

However, it did not appear at the beginning of the match that Vojvodina would be so easily defeated in Romania. The rookies parried the Arcades quite well, consistently scoring in the game, but were costed by two big mistakes at the very end of the set. On the first, and also the only set, ball of the opposing team, the away team volleyball players dashed straight into the top of the net on a triple block. That way, they almost donated the set to Arcade - 25:23.
This was followed by a logical fall in the game of Novi Sad. At the start of the game, Arcade got into a series of points, and Lale did not manage to take Nils Klapwijk out of service for long. Almost 15 points were not played, but it was clear who would take the second set. By the end, the home team just routinely brought it all to an end - 25:17.
Neither did the third set bring about a major change in the field. Vojvodina tried to deal with, objectively speaking, a better quality rival, but always ran into an impenetrable wall. Admittedly, Lale was again pretty close to the Arcade of Galatians, but they came down at the very end - 25:21.
Thus, it will be a miracle in Novi Sad in seven days for Vojvodina to stay in the competition for the Champions League standings. If this does not happen, Lale will continue the competition in the CEV Cup, a competition of slightly lower quality.

Photo:
MN Press
